data.eml:eml: Australian mycophagous species of the genus Deplorothrips (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mound, Laurence A., Tree, Desley J. (2016): Australian mycophagous species of the genus Deplorothrips (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripinae). Zootaxa 4208 (3): 201-220, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4208.3.1
